    Renderer, Transformer

    public class SpectraRenderer
extends MatrixRenderer
    Renderer for spectra data TODO: different axis labeling schemes. $Log: not supported by cvs2svn $ Revision 1.3 2006/07/25 16:23:33 cervelli Changes for new DefaultFrameDecorator. Revision 1.2 2006/07/22 20:15:45 cervelli Interim changes for conversion to FrameDecorators. Revision 1.1 2005/09/04 18:13:34 dcervelli Initial commit.
    Author:
    Dan Cervelli
